channel.title: WebVirtCloud on Bill World
channel.description: Recent content in WebVirtCloud on Bill World

item.title: WebVirtCloud部署笔记
item.description: 系统配置 # SELinux 允许WebVirtCloud通行 1 sudo semanage fcontext -a -t httpd_sys_content_t "/srv/webvirtcloud(/.*)" 或关闭SELINUX 1 2 vi /etc/selinux/config 1 2 SELINUX=disabled # 防火墙 允许nginx和novnc通行。 1 2 3
